file_content.text: You know the worst thing about Darth Angral? His breath.
Don't take this the wrong way, but I've never been happier to see anyone my whole life.
I'm glad you're safe, but I need to know what this was all about.
Tell me what happened.
Not much to tell. One second I'm watching smugglers haggle over spice, next thing I know the Sith have me.
Anything for a friend.
I promise this won't happen again. Getting rescued is bad for my self-confidence.
That goes double for me.
[Flirt] Me too.
That's, uh, interesting to hear. Anyway, we've got big problems.
The next time you fail me, Padawan, don't expect a rescue.
You disappointed me.
Oh, good. I was afraid you might get all mushy on me.
Angral wanted to know everything about you. Threatened to kill me if I didn't answer all his questions.
You obviously didn't tell him anything useful.
But you resisted him.
What kind of Jedi do you think I am?
I'm sorry if he hurt you.
This is my fault.
Don't apologize. I knew what I was signing on for when we left Coruscant.
You look pretty good for someone tortured by a Sith.
Why didn't he?
We never got to the actual torture part. He was sending me to Dromund Kaas for that.
Angral left with an Imperial admiral to refit a battle cruiser. Sounds like they have some new weapon.
T7 = scanned Tarnis + Angral design schematics // Desolator world-killer weapon = attaches to battle cruiser
"Desolator"? We should warn the general about this right away.
Why don't we deal with all these Sith before we start the small talk? What do you say?
